verses.kjv: And David spake unto the LORD the words of this song in the day that the LORD had delivered him out of the hand of all his enemies, and out of the hand of Saul:
verses.web: David spoke to LORD the words of this song in the day that LORD delivered him out of the hand of all his enemies, and out of the hand of Saul,
verses.ct: David sang this song to the LORD on the day the LORD rescued him from all his enemies, including Saul:

verses.kjv: And he said, The LORD is my rock, and my fortress, and my deliverer;
verses.web: and he said: “LORD is my rock, my fortress, and my deliverer, even mine;
verses.ct: He said, "The LORD is my rock, my fortress, and my deliverer.

verses.kjv: The God of my rock; in him will I trust: he is my shield, and the horn of my salvation, my high tower, and my refuge, my saviour; thou savest me from violence.
verses.web: God is my rock in whom I take refuge; my shield, and the horn of my salvation, my high tower, and my refuge. My savior, you save me from violence.
verses.ct: God is the rock where I find refuge. He is my shield, the strength of my salvation, my high tower, and my safe place. My savior, you rescue me from violence.

verses.kjv: I will call on the LORD, who is worthy to be praised: so shall I be saved from mine enemies.
verses.web: I call on LORD, who is worthy to be praised; So shall I be saved from my enemies.
verses.ct: I call out to the LORD — he deserves all praise — and I am saved from my enemies.

verses.kjv: When the waves of death compassed me, the floods of ungodly men made me afraid;
verses.web: For the waves of death surrounded me. The floods of ungodliness made me afraid.
verses.ct: The waves of death closed in around me, and floods of destruction terrified me.

verses.kjv: The sorrows of hell compassed me about; the snares of death prevented me;
verses.web: The cords of Sheol were around me. The snares of death caught me.
verses.ct: The cords of the grave wrapped around me, and death's traps caught me.

verses.kjv: In my distress I called upon the LORD, and cried to my God: and he did hear my voice out of his temple, and my cry did enter into his ears.
verses.web: In my distress, I called on LORD. Yes, I called to my God. He heard my voice out of his temple. My cry came into his ears.
verses.ct: In my desperation I cried out to the LORD — I called to my God for help. He heard my voice from his temple, and my cry reached his ears.

verses.kjv: Then the earth shook and trembled; the foundations of heaven moved and shook, because he was wroth.
verses.web: Then the earth shook and trembled. The foundations of heaven quaked and were shaken, because he was angry.
verses.ct: Then the earth shook and trembled. The foundations of the heavens quaked and shuddered because he was angry.

verses.kjv: There went up a smoke out of his nostrils, and fire out of his mouth devoured: coals were kindled by it.
verses.web: Smoke went up out of his nostrils. Consuming fire came out of his mouth. Coals were kindled by it.
verses.ct: Smoke poured from his nostrils, and consuming fire blazed from his mouth. Burning coals flared out from him.

verses.kjv: He bowed the heavens also, and came down; and darkness was under his feet.
verses.web: He bowed the heavens also, and came down. Thick darkness was under his feet.
verses.ct: He parted the heavens and came down, with thick darkness beneath his feet.

verses.kjv: And he rode upon a cherub, and did fly: and he was seen upon the wings of the wind.
verses.web: He rode on a cherub, and flew. Yes, he was seen on the wings of the wind.
verses.ct: He rode on a cherub and flew, soaring on the wings of the wind.

verses.kjv: And he made darkness pavilions round about him, dark waters, and thick clouds of the skies.
verses.web: He made darkness a shelter around himself: gathering of waters, and thick clouds of the skies.
verses.ct: He wrapped himself in darkness like a canopy — dark waters and thick clouds surrounded him.

verses.kjv: Through the brightness before him were coals of fire kindled.
verses.web: At the brightness before him, coals of fire were kindled.
verses.ct: From the brilliance of his presence, coals of fire blazed to life.

verses.kjv: The LORD thundered from heaven, and the most High uttered his voice.
verses.web: LORD thundered from heaven. The Most High uttered his voice.
verses.ct: The LORD thundered from heaven, and the Most High let his voice ring out.

verses.kjv: And he sent out arrows, and scattered them; lightning, and discomfited them.
verses.web: He sent out arrows, and scattered them; lightning, and confused them.
verses.ct: He launched his arrows and scattered my enemies; he hurled lightning and threw them into chaos.

verses.kjv: And the channels of the sea appeared, the foundations of the world were discovered, at the rebuking of the LORD, at the blast of the breath of his nostrils.
verses.web: Then the channels of the sea appeared. The foundations of the world were laid bare by LORD’s rebuke, at the blast of the breath of his nostrils.
verses.ct: The channels of the sea were exposed, and the foundations of the earth were laid bare at the LORD's rebuke, at the fierce blast of breath from his nostrils.

verses.kjv: He sent from above, he took me; he drew me out of many waters;
verses.web: He sent from on high and he took me. He drew me out of many waters.
verses.ct: He reached down from above and took hold of me. He pulled me out of deep waters.

verses.kjv: He delivered me from my strong enemy, and from them that hated me: for they were too strong for me.
verses.web: He delivered me from my strong enemy, from those who hated me, for they were too mighty for me.
verses.ct: He rescued me from my powerful enemy, from those who hated me — they were far too strong for me.

verses.kjv: They prevented me in the day of my calamity: but the LORD was my stay.
verses.web: They came on me in the day of my calamity, but LORD was my support.
verses.ct: They ambushed me on the worst day of my life, but the LORD was my support.

verses.kjv: He brought me forth also into a large place: he delivered me, because he delighted in me.
verses.web: He also brought me out into a large place. He delivered me, because he delighted in me.
verses.ct: He brought me out into an open place. He rescued me because he was pleased with me.

verses.kjv: The LORD rewarded me according to my righteousness: according to the cleanness of my hands hath he recompensed me.
verses.web: LORD rewarded me according to my righteousness. He rewarded me according to the cleanness of my hands.
verses.ct: The LORD rewarded me for doing what was right. He repaid me because my hands were clean.

verses.kjv: For I have kept the ways of the LORD, and have not wickedly departed from my God.
verses.web: For I have kept LORD’s ways, and have not wickedly departed from my God.
verses.ct: I have followed the LORD's ways and have not turned away from my God in wickedness.

verses.kjv: For all his judgments were before me: and as for his statutes, I did not depart from them.
verses.web: For all his ordinances were before me. As for his statutes, I didn’t depart from them.
verses.ct: I kept all his laws in front of me and never set aside his commands.

verses.kjv: I was also upright before him, and have kept myself from mine iniquity.
verses.web: I was also perfect toward him. I kept myself from my iniquity.
verses.ct: I was blameless before him and guarded myself from sin.

verses.kjv: Therefore the LORD hath recompensed me according to my righteousness; according to my cleanness in his eye sight.
verses.web: Therefore LORD has rewarded me according to my righteousness, According to my cleanness in his eyesight.
verses.ct: So the LORD has rewarded me for my righteousness, for the cleanness he sees in me.

verses.kjv: With the merciful thou wilt shew thyself merciful, and with the upright man thou wilt shew thyself upright.
verses.web: With the merciful you will show yourself merciful. With the perfect man you will show yourself perfect.
verses.ct: To the merciful, you show mercy. To the blameless, you show yourself blameless.

verses.kjv: With the pure thou wilt shew thyself pure; and with the froward thou wilt shew thyself unsavoury.
verses.web: With the pure you will show yourself pure. With the crooked you will show yourself shrewd.
verses.ct: To the pure, you show yourself pure. But to the crooked, you show yourself shrewd.

verses.kjv: And the afflicted people thou wilt save: but thine eyes are upon the haughty, that thou mayest bring them down.
verses.web: You will save the afflicted people, But your eyes are on the arrogant, that you may bring them down.
verses.ct: You save people who are suffering, but your eyes are on the arrogant — and you bring them down.

verses.kjv: For thou art my lamp, O LORD: and the LORD will lighten my darkness.
verses.web: For you are my lamp, LORD. LORD will light up my darkness.
verses.ct: You are my lamp, LORD. The LORD turns my darkness into light.

verses.kjv: For by thee I have run through a troop: by my God have I leaped over a wall.
verses.web: For by you, I run against a troop. By my God, I leap over a wall.
verses.ct: With your help I can charge an army. With my God I can scale a wall.

verses.kjv: As for God, his way is perfect; the word of the LORD is tried: he is a buckler to all them that trust in him.
verses.web: As for God, his way is perfect. LORD’s word is tested. He is a shield to all those who take refuge in him.
verses.ct: As for God, his way is perfect. The word of the LORD has been proven true. He is a shield to everyone who takes refuge in him.

verses.kjv: For who is God, save the LORD? and who is a rock, save our God?
verses.web: For who is God, besides LORD? Who is a rock, besides our God?
verses.ct: Who is God besides the LORD? And who is a rock except our God?

verses.kjv: God is my strength and power: and he maketh my way perfect.
verses.web: God is my strong fortress. He makes my way perfect.
verses.ct: God is my mighty fortress. He makes my path smooth and sure.

verses.kjv: He maketh my feet like hinds’ feet: and setteth me upon my high places.
verses.web: He makes his feet like hinds’ feet, and sets me on my high places.
verses.ct: He makes my feet as sure as a deer's and sets me on the highest ground.

verses.kjv: He teacheth my hands to war; so that a bow of steel is broken by mine arms.
verses.web: He teaches my hands to war, so that my arms bend a bow of bronze.
verses.ct: He trains my hands for battle so that my arms can bend a bow of bronze.

verses.kjv: Thou hast also given me the shield of thy salvation: and thy gentleness hath made me great.
verses.web: You have also given me the shield of your salvation. Your gentleness has made me great.
verses.ct: You have given me the shield of your salvation, and your gentleness has made me great.

verses.kjv: Thou hast enlarged my steps under me; so that my feet did not slip.
verses.web: You have enlarged my steps under me. My feet have not slipped.
verses.ct: You cleared a wide path for my feet so that my ankles never gave way.

verses.kjv: I have pursued mine enemies, and destroyed them; and turned not again until I had consumed them.
verses.web: I have pursued my enemies and destroyed them. I didn’t turn again until they were consumed.
verses.ct: I chased my enemies and destroyed them. I didn't turn back until they were finished.

verses.kjv: And I have consumed them, and wounded them, that they could not arise: yea, they are fallen under my feet.
verses.web: I have consumed them, and struck them through, so that they can’t arise. Yes, they have fallen under my feet.
verses.ct: I crushed them and struck them down so they couldn't get up again. They fell beneath my feet.

verses.kjv: For thou hast girded me with strength to battle: them that rose up against me hast thou subdued under me.
verses.web: For you have armed me with strength for the battle. You have subdued under me those who rose up against me.
verses.ct: You armed me with strength for battle. You made those who rose against me bow down before me.

verses.kjv: Thou hast also given me the necks of mine enemies, that I might destroy them that hate me.
verses.web: You have also made my enemies turn their backs to me, that I might cut off those who hate me.
verses.ct: You made my enemies turn and run, and I wiped out everyone who hated me.

verses.kjv: They looked, but there was none to save; even unto the LORD, but he answered them not.
verses.web: They looked, but there was no one to save; even to LORD, but he didn’t answer them.
verses.ct: They looked for help, but no one came to save them. They even cried out to the LORD, but he didn't answer.

verses.kjv: Then did I beat them as small as the dust of the earth, I did stamp them as the mire of the street, and did spread them abroad.
verses.web: Then I beat them as small as the dust of the earth. I crushed them as the mire of the streets, and spread them abroad.
verses.ct: I ground them fine as dust on the ground. I crushed them like mud in the streets and scattered them.

verses.kjv: Thou also hast delivered me from the strivings of my people, thou hast kept me to be head of the heathen: a people which I knew not shall serve me.
verses.web: You also have delivered me from the strivings of my people. You have kept me to be the head of the nations. A people whom I have not known will serve me.
verses.ct: You rescued me from the conflicts within my own people. You made me the head of nations. People I'd never even heard of now serve me.

verses.kjv: Strangers shall submit themselves unto me: as soon as they hear, they shall be obedient unto me.
verses.web: The foreigners will submit themselves to me. As soon as they hear of me, they will obey me.
verses.ct: Foreigners come cringing before me. The moment they hear of me, they obey.

verses.kjv: Strangers shall fade away, and they shall be afraid out of their close places.
verses.web: The foreigners will fade away, and will come trembling out of their close places.
verses.ct: Foreigners lose their courage and come trembling out of their strongholds.

verses.kjv: The LORD liveth; and blessed be my rock; and exalted be the God of the rock of my salvation.
verses.web: LORD lives! Blessed be my rock! Exalted be God, the rock of my salvation,
verses.ct: The LORD lives! Blessed be my rock! Exalted be God, the rock of my salvation!

verses.kjv: It is God that avengeth me, and that bringeth down the people under me,
verses.web: even the God who executes vengeance for me, who brings down peoples under me,
verses.ct: He is the God who avenges me and brings nations under my feet.

verses.kjv: And that bringeth me forth from mine enemies: thou also hast lifted me up on high above them that rose up against me: thou hast delivered me from the violent man.
verses.web: who brings me away from my enemies. Yes, you lift me up above those who rise up against me. You deliver me from the violent man.
verses.ct: He rescues me from my enemies. You lift me high above those who attack me. You deliver me from violent men.

verses.kjv: Therefore I will give thanks unto thee, O LORD, among the heathen, and I will sing praises unto thy name.
verses.web: Therefore I will give thanks to you, LORD, among the nations, and will sing praises to your name.
verses.ct: For this reason, LORD, I will praise you among the nations and sing to your name.

verses.kjv: He is the tower of salvation for his king: and sheweth mercy to his anointed, unto David, and to his seed for evermore.
verses.web: He gives great deliverance to his king, and shows loving kindness to his anointed, to David and to his offspring, forever more.”
verses.ct: He is a tower of salvation for his king. He shows faithful love to his anointed — to David and his descendants forever."
